data.oai_dc:dc: Species table used in the calculation of co-occurrence networks

This is a site by species occurence table used for all analyses within the manuscript. The data contains information regarding species detections (presence/absence) by sites (with each row identifying each of the 5 distinct survey events for each site [data was aggregated by site for richness and compositional analyses]). Data on the level of agricultulral transformation (%_surrouding_naiveness) and the region (Western and Tablelands) are provided both as continuous and factor values.
